Text.Name: Spell_SYSLOST
Text.Desc: A lost building that nobody recognizes. \n(Empty.)

Text.Name: Spell_MoveSpeed1
Text.Desc: Talisman used to raise move speed.

Text.Name: Spell_TempLow1
Text.Desc: Talisman used to raise resistance to cold.

Text.Name: Spell_TempHigh1
Text.Desc: Talisman used to raise resistance to heat.

Text.Name: Spell_ReadNovel
Text.Desc: A strange talisman from no where. It is easy to draw but has a strange effect, so it is widely spread among the cultivation realm. After equiped, one can focus on this talisman and see many maverlous stories from Webnovel and get released. However, it will easily catch one's attention and slow down work and cultivation speed.\n[color=#D06508]Thank Webnovel APP for supporting our game.[/color]

Text.Name: Spell_MoveSpeed2
Text.Desc: Talisman used to raise move speed, as well as speed during adventures.

Text.Name: Spell_RecoveryPower
Text.Desc: Talisman used to raise natural recovery rate.

Text.Name: Spell_VisionRadius
Text.Desc: Talisman used to improve range of views, and reduce time spent discovering a new location in adventure.

Text.Name: Spell_Fatigue
Text.Desc: Talisman used to improve sleep quality and reduce tendency of fatigue.

Text.Name: Spell_Nutrition
Text.Desc: Used to raise efficiency of Qi absorption and fasting.

Text.Name: Spell_Nutrition1
Text.Desc: Used to reduce food consumption rate.

Text.Name: Spell_Hide
Text.Desc: Talisman used to hide your presence to some extent, become less identifiable by others during adventure, and reduce chances of obtaining reputation.

Text.Name: Spell_Happy
Text.Desc: Talisman used to improve mood and reduce entertainment need.

Text.Name: Spell_LunHui_ShenShen
Text.Desc: Talisman formed by prayers of others, used to improve mood and stabilize mental state.

Text.Name: Spell_TempLow2
Text.Desc: Talisman used to drastically raise resistance to cold.

Text.Name: Spell_TempHigh2
Text.Desc: Talisman used to drastically raise resistance to heat.

Text.Name: Spell_Intelligence
Text.Desc: Used to clear mind and improve learning abilities.

Text.Name: Spell_Fight
Text.Desc: Used to improve fighting abilities and pain endurance.

Text.Name: Spell_GlobalEfficiency
Text.Desc: Used to improve work efficiency.

Text.Name: Spell_MadeQualityAddValue
Text.Desc: Used to improve quality of crafted items.

Text.Name: Spell_Yield
Text.Desc: Used to raise yield during hunting, farming and harvesting.

Text.Name: Spell_Treatment
Text.Desc: Used to raise healing success rate and its effect.

Text.Name: Spell_MindState1
Text.Desc: Talisman used to slightly improve mental state.

Text.Name: Spell_DeepPracticeSpeedSpecialCoefficient1
Text.Desc: Talisman used to slightly improve cultivation speed.

Text.Name: Spell_MindState2
Text.Desc: Talisman used to improve mental state.

Text.Name: Spell_MindState2_LunHui
Text.Desc: Scarce talisman passed down from thousands of years ago, created by the ancient immortal Yuan rewriting the Talisman of Divine Caves. \n[color=#D06508]This is in appreciation of the first player to successfully draw a talisman of 100% quality: Actually not me[/color]

Text.Name: Spell_SpeedOfMindStateCoefficientByMoods
Text.Desc: Used to raise the chance of breakthrough.

Text.Name: Spell_DeepPracticeSpeedSpecialCoefficient2
Text.Desc: Used to raise cultivation speed.

Text.Name: Spell_WorldMapFlySpeed
Text.Desc: Used to raise long-distance fly speed with a artifact.

Text.Name: Spell_FabaoMake_SuccessRateAddV
Text.Desc: Talisman used to improve success rate of artifact crafting.

Text.Name: Spell_FabaoMake_LingInheritRateAddV
Text.Desc: Used to slightly raise the tier of crafted artifact.

Text.Name: Spell_DanMake_SuccessRateAddV
Text.Desc: Used to improve success rate of Alchemy.

Text.Name: Spell_DanMake_YieldAddP
Text.Desc: Used to slightly raise yield of Alchemy.

Text.Name: Spell_Fu
Text.Desc: Used to improve mood and mental state of whomever wears it and grant good luck. Happy Spring Festival and all the best!

Text.Name: Spell_Lu
Text.Desc: Used to improve health and material gains for whomever wears it. Happy Spring Festival and all the best!

Text.Name: Spell_Shou
Text.Desc: Used to raise lifespan and immunity to diseases for whomever wears it. Happy Spring Festival and all the best!

Text.Name: Spell_Shield1
Text.Desc: Increases the wearer's Protection.

Text.Name: Spell_Shield2
Text.Desc: Increases the wearer's Protection skill level.

Text.Name: Spell_Shield_Jin
Text.Desc: Increases the wearer's resistance to Metal Damage.

Text.Name: Spell_Shield_Mu
Text.Desc: Increases the wearer's resistance to Wood Damage.

Text.Name: Spell_Shield_Shui
Text.Desc: Increases the wearer's resistance to Water Damage.

Text.Name: Spell_Shield_Huo
Text.Desc: Increases the wearer's resistance to Fire Damage.

Text.Name: Spell_Shield_Tu
Text.Desc: Increases the wearer's resistance to Earth Damage.

Text.Name: Spell_FaBao1
Text.Desc: Increases Artifact Power.

Text.Name: Spell_FaBao2
Text.Desc: Increases the wearer's Artifact Mastery skill level.

Text.Name: Spell_FaBao3
Text.Desc: Increases the wearer's Artifact Qi Recovery Multiplier.

Text.Name: Spell_FaBao4
Text.Desc: Fundamentally increases the wearer's Artifact Power, and comprehensively improves Artifact abilities.

Text.Name: Spell_FightSkill1
Text.Desc: Increases the wearer's Spell Power.

Text.Name: Spell_FightSkill2
Text.Desc: Increases the wearer's Spell skill level.

Text.Name: Spell_FightSkill3
Text.Desc: Fundamentally decreases the wearer's Qi Cost of Spells.

Text.Name: Spell_FightSkill4
Text.Desc: Fundamentally increases the wearer's Spell Power and Qi Cost.

Text.Name: Spell_TongTian1
Text.Desc: Increases the wearer's Five Attributes.

Text.Name: Spell_TongTian2
Text.Desc: Decreases the wearer's Attainment.

Text.Name: Spell_TongTian3
Text.Desc: Increases the wearer's Potential.

Text.Name: Spell_JieTian1
Text.Desc: Increases the wearer's Attainment.

Text.Name: Spell_GodPractice1
Text.Desc: Increases Max Divine Residents limit for the wearer.

Text.Name: Spell_GodPractice2
Text.Desc: Increases the wearer's Belief Gains Bonus.

Text.Name: Spell_GodPractice3
Text.Desc: Increases the wearer's Divinity.

Text.Name: Spell_GodPractice4
Text.Desc: Decreases the wearer's Divinity.
